name: sui-grpc-client
description: Production-ready gRPC client for Sui blockchain wallet and object data

scripts.proto:generate: npm run proto:clean && npm run proto:compile
scripts.proto:compile: mkdir -p src/generated && grpc_tools_node_protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ts=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts --plugin=protoc-gen-grpc=./node_modules/.bin/grpc_tools_node_protoc_plugin --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:src/generated --ts_out=grpc_js:src/generated --grpc_out=grpc_js:src/generated --proto_path=protos protos/sui/rpc/v2beta2/*.proto protos/google/rpc/*.proto protos/google/protobuf/*.proto
